subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Papiss Demba Cisse scored twice as Newcastle won at West Bromwich Albion, 3-1, in its push for a top-four finish in the Premier League and a Champions League berth.
snippet: Papiss Demba Cisse scored twice as Newcastle won at West Bromwich Albion, 3-1, in its push for a top-four finish in the Premier League and a Champions League berth.
